events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer role with our company. Thank you for your interest.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department, specifically for the software development team.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to manage your application moving forward.
We conducted an initial screening call to discuss your experience and suitability for the Software Engineer position.
Thank you for promptly responding to the initial screening. Your answers have been noted and appreciated.
Your technical interview with our senior engineering team has been scheduled for May 8th at 2 PM UTC.
The technical interview was completed successfully. The team was impressed with your coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
We have scheduled the HR interview to discuss company culture, benefits, and other general employment details on May 12th.
Your HR interview went well, and all questions regarding the role and company policies were addressed.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer position, including details about salary and benefits.
We received your feedback expressing enthusiasm for the offer and some questions about start date flexibility.
You have formally accepted the offer. We are excited to welcome you to the engineering team.
The onboarding process is underway with orientation sessions, access provisioning, and initial training scheduled.
The hiring process has been successfully completed. Welcome aboard as our new Software Engineer.
